content.body: HTML spec question: I can't find where it's defined (if at all) which `submitter` is chosen when e.g. the user presses `enter` in a text input field. Am I missing something? An old conversation that I don't have context for?

> <@abotella:igalia.com> https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/form-control-infrastructure.html#implicit-submission

OK so what I found is a WebKit bug and not a spec bug, will file. Many thanks!
